GSD.impact: remote code execution in the kernel
GSD.credit: Natalie Silvanovich of Google Project Zero
GSD.summary: A buffer overflow issue was addressed in AppleAVD (a kernel extension for processing H.264, HEVC, and VP9) in iOS, iPadOS, tvOS, and watchOS  with improved bounds checking. A remote user may be able to cause kernel code execution via this vulnerability.
GSD.details: A buffer overflow issue was addressed in AppleAVD (a kernel extension for processing H.264, HEVC, and VP9) in iOS, iPadOS, tvOS, and watchOS  with improved bounds checking. A remote user may be able to cause kernel code execution via this vulnerability.
